title: A Carrot
description: Rob Schneider is a Wall Street executive with everything going for him. Only problem is, he’s about to become a carrot. It’s 24 carrot comedy!
altHero: a shocked Rob Schneider has turned into a giant carrot
alt1: Rob and woman drinking martinis in a hot tub
alt2: Rob dancing in a high-rise office
alt3: carrot Rob walking amongst a crowd of businessmen
alt4: carrot Rob being attacked by a giant rabbit
